text: Hello all! I'm a Creative Operations Lead at <https://www.seerinteractive.com/|Seer Interactive>. We're looking for a freelance expert HubSpot developer to help us with one-off website projects over the course of the year on an hourly basis as we design new page template UX/UI and navigation updates. If you're interested, please shoot me a note along with any HubSpot portfolio pieces. Thanks!
